channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Kurdish Distrust of Syria’s New Government Runs Deep
item.description: The Kurdish-led force that runs northeast Syria has agreed to integrate into a new national army, but some of its supporters remain wary.

item.title: Ukraine Pinning War Hopes on Expanded Drone Program
item.description: Ukraine has adapted strategies and weapons during its fight against Russia. It is now banking on expanding the use of domestically produced drones, ev...

item.title: Employees are engaging in revenge RTO, but these small acts of defiance are the symptom of a bigger problem
item.description: Small workplace infractions like stealing snacks and leaving early are signs that the workplace social contract has broken down.

item.title: One Key to a Successful Campaign for Pope? Act Like You’re Not Campaigning.
item.description: Crucial meetings will be held this week in which contenders begin jockeying in earnest for the job of leading the Roman Catholic Church.

item.title: This 35-year-old investor has backed the hottest companies in AI, from Mistral to Sierra
item.description: Sarah Guo went from youngest partner at Greylock to her own firm, Conviction.

item.title: Spain and Parts of Portugal and France Hit by Widespread Power Outage

item.title: Gen X retirees have regrets over how much they saved—they’re copying Gen Z and turning to side gigs
item.description: Feeling the burn of inflation and not saving enough, some retirees are embracing side gigs and breaking the stigma that the end of their careers has t...

item.title: Ukranian-American who named his business after Elon Musk has a change of heart
item.description: That will cost him up to $20,000.

item.title: Conclave to Choose New Pope Will Start May 7, Vatican Says

item.title: Exclusive: What If AI could design a jet engine—or even a starship? Google DeepMind and Airbus veterans just raised $23M with an eye on that future
item.description: P-1 AI just raised $23 million to build a new kind of AI engineer that could someday design starships.

item.title: Canadians are going to the polls. Here’s the latest.
item.description: In the most important election of a generation, Canadians are heading to the polls Monday. Here’s what to know, and what to expect.

item.title: Major Power Outage Hits Spain, Portugal and France
item.description: The blackout affected millions of people and disrupted critical infrastructure such as train systems and traffic lights.
